title: Windows 10 Viable and Playable?!
body: Hello, i was just writing down a concern, with the upcoming release of windows 10 looming on the horizon and having not really looked thoroughly into matters i wonder will League of Legends be able to run smoothly on that system or does it need time to be able to register everything once the new system is released. If anyone has any information on this is would be highly appreciated, just concerned if i need to post pone updating until i am sure that i shall be able to still play league ^^

replies.body:
Hey SilentYoshi,

This thread should answer most of your questions with League of Legends and Windows 10:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/AnR7gUle-will-windows-10-and-league-of-legends-be-friends
